mapper.sql: select bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{view_cnt}, #{comment_cnt}, now(), now())
mapper.select: ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
